description: Try our easy to follow Ginger & Lime Icy Poles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Ginger & Lime Icy Poles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put sugar and 2 cups water into a saucepan and bring to the boil over medium heat, stirring constantly to dissolve sugar. Add ginger and mint and simmer for 5 minutes, Remove from heat and set aside for 20 minutes to cool.
Strain syrup, discarding ginger and mint. Combine 1 cup of the syrup with 1 1/2 cups of water, citrus juice and both citrus zests. Pour into moulds, insert sticks, cover and freeze.
